name: AskSonic
description: AskSonic is an Alexa skill to play music from Subsonic API compatible music servers.

ASKS_SUBSONIC_URL.description: The base URL of your Subsonic-compatible music server. Must be https. Must not include the URL path, use the 'server path' parameter for that. Example: 'https://subdomain.domain.com'

ASKS_SUBSONIC_SERVERPATH.description: [Optional] The server path pointing to your Subsonic-compatible music server. Goes after the base URL. Must contain only the path, not the domain name. Example: '/path/to/rest'

ASKS_SUBSONIC_PORT.description: [Optional] The port your Subsonic server listens on

ASKS_SUBSONIC_APIVERSION.description: [Optional] The supported API version of your Subsonic server

ASKS_ROUTE_PREFIX.description: [Optional] The endpoint that Alexa will use to communicate with AskSonic
